articles.description: Vaccine developers Pfizer Inc and Moderna Inc on Monday rejected U.S. President Donald Trump's invitation to attend a White House "Vaccine Summit".
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: CVS needs to hire thousands to roll out vaccine distribution – here are the jobs available - Fox Business
articles.description: CVS is prepared to provide vaccinations in all 50 states, as well as Washington, D.C., and Puerto Rico, based on the prioritization schedule.
articles.content:

articles.author: Caralyn Ryan and Douglas S. Wood, CNN
articles.title: A couple, married 50 years, die just hours apart from Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: The couple, who had known each other since high school and celebrated their 50th anniversary in September, likely caught the virus mourning their mother, and spent a little over a week in the ICU.
articles.content: (CNN)In early November, Wilma Gail Bowen and Willard Bowen mourned the loss of Willard's mother, who had died from dementia and Covid-19 complications. Three weeks later, on Thanksgiving Day, the Geo… [+2717 chars]
